titles.title: MOVE Act of 2023
Maximizing Office Value and Efficiency Act of 2023
MOVE Act of 2023
Maximizing Office Value and Efficiency Act of 2023
To direct the Administrator of General Services to identify two Federal agencies to consolidate into the GSA Headquarters Building, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
